tool_description:
Convenient URL shortening service without ads and registration. You will get a link like https://mrshort.org/abcdefg
To get the statistics of clicks on your link, enter the your password in the POST request.
name: URL Shortener - We store your links forever!
title: URL Shortener - We store your links forever!
tool_name: URL Shortener - We store your links forever!

api_list.name: GET request
api_list.description:
Enter your password to get click-through statistics for your link.
Shows long URL and visitor statistics.
